name: The Second Cataclysm
uniques: Only available <when number of [Nuke Detonation Counter] is more than [19]>
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
quote: 'In one of the countless billions of galaxies in the universe lies a medium-size star, and one of its satellites, a green and insignificant planet, is now dead.' - Ending Narration, Beneath the Planet of the Apes
